sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import api from "../utils/Api" function Main(props) { const [userName, setUserName] = React.useState(""); const [userDescription, setUserDescription] = React.useState(""); const [userAvatar, setUserAvatar] = React.useState(""); React.useEffect(() => { api.getUserInfo() .then((userData) => { setUserName(userData.name); setUserDescription(userData.info); setUserAvatar(userData.avatar) }) .catch((error) => { console.log(`Ошибка: ${error}`); }) } ) return (

{userName}

{userDescription}

 ) }; export default Main;
